briefTitle: Long-Term Study of Hydrocodone Bitartrate Controlled-release Capsules in Subjects With Chronic Pain
officialTitle: A Long-Term Open-Label Safety Study of Hydrocodone Bitartrate Controlled-Release Capsules With Flexible Dosing to Treat Subjects With Moderate to Severe Chronic Pain
summary: This Phase 3, multi-center study will evaluate the long-term safety and tolerability of hydrocodone bitartrate controlled release capsule (HC-CR) at daily doses of 40 mg or more in subjects with moderate to severe chronic pain. Long-term maintenance of HC-CR efficacy will be evaluated.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change in Average Daily Pain

effectByArm.arm: Open-label Hydrocodone Bitartrate Extended Release Capsules
